function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Homeless individuals unable to comply with lockdown rules","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and lack of access to resources","Mitigation":"Provide support and resources for homeless individuals, and develop targeted intervention strategies","Technologies":"Location-tracking apps, intervention organizing apps","People":"Homeless individuals, migrant workers","Owner":"NGOs, consultancy firms, smart city initiatives"},{"Description":"Police intervention and use of force against homeless individuals","Impact":"Violence and trauma, potential spread of disease","Mitigation":"Training for law enforcement, improved communication and de-escalation tactics","Technologies":"Location-tracking apps, communication tools","People":"Homeless individuals, law enforcement","Owner":"NGOs, law enforcement agencies, smart city initiatives"},{"Description":"Limited means and resources for the third smart city in the Global South","Impact":"Inadequate response to pandemic, increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Increased funding and resources, collaborative partnerships with other smart cities","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure, collaboration platforms","People":"Population in Global South cities","Owner":"Smart city initiatives, government"}]}
